TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrintingCanceledException extends System.Printing.PrintJobException

summary.span: 代码尝试访问已取消的打印作业时出现的异常。

span.span: The exception that occurs when code attempts to access a canceled print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要创建[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序包含打印功能且允许打印作业被取消，请务必正确处理此异常。If you are creating a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application that includes printing functionality and allows print jobs to be canceled, be sure to correctly handle this exception. 此类型的未经处理的异常会导致 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序停止响应。An unhandled exception of this type can cause a Windows Presentation Foundation application to stop responding. > [!CAUTION] > 类中命名空间不支持的 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中的使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果你想要从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.
